description:
Do you desire to hear God’s voice and move in the prophetic?  If so, this course is for you!  Prophetic Ministry for Everyone is a Bible-based training program aimed at all Christians.  This course equips you to move effectively and accurately in the prophetic.  You will learn what prophecy is, why we should prophesy, that we can all prophesy, how to prophesy, what the different prophetic expressions are, and how to test prophetic words.

You will be equipped to see visions, hear God’s voice, and also understand what prophetic praise, prophetic prayer, prophetic actions, and prophetic parables are.

Also included with this course is the instructor's eBook: “Moving in the Prophetic”!
title: Prophecy for Everyone: Learn How You Can Prophesy
